mean_cn: n. 省略符号，撇号，呼语，顿呼
mean_en: the punctuation mark ' used to show that letters or numbers are missing (as when “did” and “not” are combined into “didn't” or when the date 1776 is written as '76)
word_etyma: apo离开+strophe转→把单词中的字母转远了→省略符号，撇号；呼语，顿呼
sentence: Two apostrophes next to each other make a quotation mark.
sentence_trans: 两个连在一起的撇号就成了引号。
